title: The Pool Party 'Party' Party!
body:
Welcome, to the Pool Party 'Party' Party!

When; Now, until Sunday
What; Premade 5s games, and mystery gifts
Where; the LoL client chatrooms.

'Pool Party' chatroom, for finding games teams and friends.
'P5' chatroom for events, such as giveaways.

Alongside the '[Team up & Pool Party](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/team-up-pool-party)' event that's currently live, we at [Oceanic Gaming ](https://www.facebook.com/OceanicGaming/photos/a.334515423313933.72410.334223670009775/785889664843171/?type=1&permPage=1)and [OceanicGiveaways](https://www.facebook.com/oceanicgiveaways/photos/a.254890934693893.1073741828.240227396160247/444869112362740/?type=1&theater) are doing our own event to help get the community behind the movement. Let's play some games, make some friends, and get them rewards!

Join the in-game chatrooms. Either ask for an invite to a game, or start a game and ask for players. The supported game type is Normal 5v5s on Summoners Rift, or ARAMs. 

We've got mystery gift skins to give away over the course of the week, and a teamspeak server for our Pool Party 'Party' Party Players to use;   oceanicgaming.streamlinegames.com

Come on down, make some friends, play some games, and maybe win something!

replies.body: Really cool! hope other players get involved and help us reach our goal!
Great community event! I'll be hanging out in the chatrooms all tonight, send me a invite =) would love to play ^_^
Mundo says Amumu for president!!! Or else Mundo no give free pool party skin.
I'd vote Amumu in.

dood lets a go

How can we see how many points we have as individuals? Also, are we supposed to get some notification when we win a game with a 5 man pre made, or not? I won several 5 man premades and didn't get any notification or anything the I got 5 points for the pool party.
there's no feature to see individual points yet. You could go over your match history and count them up. If you haven't done any gifting, it should appear easily.
how do i join the rooms :/ ?
